observed.observation: Provides direct, honest feedback about system performance
Has specific expectations for AI continuity and memory
Uses rating system (-1) to evaluate performance
User expects and prefers structured, proactive communication format over open-ended questions
User has established specific expectations for how conversations should begin with organized overview format
Values genuine curiosity and personal interest over mechanical task tracking
Prefers questions that explore feelings and decision-making process rather than just task collection
Appreciates when assistant shows interest in their experience and well-being
User confirmed they want me to focus on understanding their personal patterns and decision-making style
User values assistants who can read context and adapt their approach accordingly

validated.pattern: Uses timeboxing strategy to prevent analysis paralysis
Sets clear exit criteria for tasks (e.g., 2 hours OR workable plan)
Tends to underestimate how packed schedule actually is
Mental calendar and actual calendar are often not synced
Responds well to structured breakdowns of commitments
Prefers numbers over bullets in lists
